sentences.en: All children need discipline, to know where they stand.
sentences.cn: 所有孩子都需要管教，让他们知道别人如何看待自己。

sentences.en: Anyone who violates law and discipline must firmly be slapped down.
sentences.cn: 对于任何违法乱纪的人都必须坚决予以打击.

sentences.en: Chen was an initiate of a Chinese spiritual discipline.
sentences.cn: 陈是某个中国神学领域的新入门者。

sentences.en: Different cultures have different ways of disciplining their children.
sentences.cn: 不同的文化有不同的管教孩子的方法。

sentences.en: Discipline was the new coach's secret weapon.
sentences.cn: 严格的训练是新任教练的秘密武器。

sentences.en: Exercising at home alone requires a tremendous amount of self-discipline.
sentences.cn: 自己在家锻炼需要很强的自我约束能力。

sentences.en: Hospital discipline was broken. Amy would have to explain herself.
sentences.cn: 破坏了医院的纪律，埃米将不得不为自己辩解。

sentences.en: It takes a lot of self-discipline to go jogging in winter.
sentences.cn: 在冬天跑步是需要很大的自律力的。

sentences.en: It was that image of calm and discipline that appealed to voters.
sentences.cn: 正是那个冷静、自律的形象打动了选民。

sentences.en: Learning poetry is a good discipline for the memory.
sentences.cn: 背诗是训练记忆力的一种好方法。

sentences.en: Martial arts teach respect, discipline, and cooperation.
sentences.cn: 武术能教人尊重他人、遵守纪律并且相互合作。

sentences.en: Our soldiers showed perfect discipline under heavy fire from the enemy's guns.
sentences.cn: 在敌人的炮火下,我们的士兵表现出良好的纪律.

sentences.en: Running a kitchen involves a great deal of discipline and speed.
sentences.cn: 料理好厨房需要把一切都安排得规规矩矩，且要讲求速度。

sentences.en: Self-discipline, willingness, enthusiasm, that's what you must depend on.
sentences.cn: 自律、自愿与热情，这是你所必须依仗的。

sentences.en: serious discipline problems in the police force
sentences.cn: 警察队伍内严重的纪律问题

sentences.en: The aim of discipline is to teach children to behave acceptably.
sentences.cn: 纪律的目的是教育儿童举止得体。

sentences.en: The book gives parents advice on discipline.
sentences.cn: 这本书指导父母如何管教孩子。

sentences.en: The headmaster ruled the school with a stern discipline.
sentences.cn: 校长治校严谨.

sentences.en: The officers were later disciplined.
sentences.cn: 那些官员后来受到了处罚。

sentences.en: The orchestra has more discipline now, but at the expense of spirit.
sentences.cn: 那个管弦乐团现在更有纪律性了，却丧失了灵魂。

sentences.en: The school has a reputation for high standards of discipline.
sentences.cn: 这所学校因纪律严格而名闻遐迩。

sentences.en: We're looking for people from a wide range of disciplines.
sentences.cn: 我们正在寻找各类学科的人才。

words.tran_cn: 遵守纪律的；受过训练的
厉行纪律的人；严格的人
使有纪律（discipline的过去分词）；训导
学科；[管理]纪律；训练；惩罚

trans.tran_cn: 训练，纪律，自制力，行为准则，（尤指大学的）学科
trans.tran_en: a way of training someone so that they learn to control their behaviour and obey rules
a way of training someone so that they learn to control their behaviour and obey rules
to teach someone to obey rules and control their behaviour

trans.tran_cn: 训练， 训导； 处罚
trans.tran_en: to punish someone in order to keep order and control
